HOME.TITLE: Cesium
HOME.MESSAGE:
Welcome to the Cesium Application!
Watch your Duniter wallets in real time.
HOME.MESSAGE_SHORT:
Watch your Duniter wallets
in real time!

POPUP_PEER.TITLE: Duniter peer
POPUP_PEER.BTN_SHOW_LIST_HELP: Enter above in the format {{'SETTINGS.POPUP_PEER.PEER_HELP'|translate}} or click on the button below:

VIEW.TITLE: Block #{{number}}
VIEW.UNIVERSAL_DIVIDEND_HELP: Money co-produced by each of the {{membersCount}} members
VIEW.EXCLUDED_COUNT_HELP: Old members, excluded because missing membreship renewal or certifications
VIEW.REVOKED_COUNT_HELP: These accounts may no longer be member

VIEW.TITLE: Currency
VIEW.DT_REEVAL: Period between two re-evaluation of the UD
VIEW.UD_REEVAL_TIME0: Date of first reevaluation of the UD
VIEW.SIG_QTY_RULE: Required number of certifications to become a member
VIEW.SIG_STOCK: Maximum number of certifications sent by a member
VIEW.SIG_PERIOD: Minimum delay between 2 certifications sent by one and the same issuer.
VIEW.SIG_WINDOW: Maximum delay before a certification will be treated
VIEW.STEP_MAX: Maximum distance between a newcomer and each referring members.
VIEW.SENTRIES: Required number of certifications to become a referring member
VIEW.SENTRIES_FORMULA: Required number of certifications to become a referring member (formula)
VIEW.XPERCENT: Minimum percent of referring member to reach to match the distance rule

INFO.ONLY_SSL_PEERS: Non-SSL nodes have a degraded display because Cesium works in HTTPS mode.

WOT.SEARCH_INIT_PHASE_WARNING: During the pre-registration phase, the search for pending registrations may be long. Please wait ...
WOT.NOT_MEMBER_ACCOUNT_HELP: This is a simple wallet, with no pending membership application.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: My Account
ACCOUNT.WAITING_CERTIFICATIONS: You need {{needCertificationCount}} certification(s) to become a member
ACCOUNT.WILL_MISSING_CERTIFICATIONS: You will lack certifications soon (at least {{willNeedCertificationCount}} more are needed)
ACCOUNT.WILL_NEED_RENEW_MEMBERSHIP: Your membership will expire {{membershipExpiresIn|formatDurationTo}}. Remember to renew your membership before then.
ACCOUNT.NEED_RENEW_MEMBERSHIP: You are no longer a member because your membership has expired. Remember to renew your membership.

NEW.TITLE: Registration
NEW.MEMBER_ACCOUNT_HELP: If you are not yet registered as an individual (one account possible per individual).
NEW.WALLET_ACCOUNT_HELP: If you represent a company, association, etc. or simply need an additional wallet. No universal dividend will be created by this account.
NEW.SALT_WARNING:
Choose a secret identifier.
You need it for each connection to this account.

Make sure to remember this identifier.
If lost, there are no means to retrieve it!
NEW.PASSWORD_WARNING:
Choose a password.
You need it for each connection to this account.

Make sure to remember this password.
If lost, there are no means to retrieve it!
NEW.PSEUDO_WARNING:
Choose a pseudonym.
It may be used by other people to find you more easily.

.Use of commas, spaces and accents is not allowed.

Example: JohnDalton, JackieChan, etc.
NEW.LAST_SLIDE_CONGRATULATION:
You completed all required fields.
You can send the account creation request.

For information, the public key below identifies your future account.
It can be communicated to third parties to receive their payment.
Once your account has been approved, you can find this key under {{'ACCOUNT.TITLE'|translate}}.
NEW.CONFIRMATION_MEMBER_ACCOUNT:
Warning: your secret identifier, password and pseudonym can not be changed.
Make sure you always remember it!
Are you sure you want to send this account creation request?
NEW.CONFIRMATION_WALLET_ACCOUNT:
Warning: your password and pseudonym can not be changed.
Make sure you always remember it!
Are you sure you want to continue?
NEW.MSG_UID_ALREADY_USED:
This pseudonym is already used by an existing member.
Please choose another one.
NEW.MSG_PUBKEY_ALREADY_USED:
Public key already used by an existing member.
Please choose other connection parameters.

POPUP_REGISTER.TITLE: Enter a pseudonym
POPUP_REGISTER.HELP: A pseudonym is needed to let other members find you.

SECURITY.TITLE: Sign-in and security

ERROR.CRYPTO_UNKNOWN_ERROR: Your browser is not compatible with cryptographic features.
ERROR.FIELD_TOO_SHORT_WITH_LENGTH: This field value is too short.
ERROR.FIELD_ACCENT: Commas and accent characters not allowed
ERROR.NEED_MEMBER_ACCOUNT_TO_CERTIFY: You could not send certification, because your account is not a member account.
ERROR.NEED_MEMBER_ACCOUNT_TO_CERTIFY_HAS_SELF:
You could not send certification now, because your are not a member yet.

You still need certification to become a member.
ERROR.NOT_MEMBER_FOR_CERTIFICATION: Your account is not a member account yet.
ERROR.IDENTITY_TO_CERTIFY_HAS_NO_SELF: This account could not be certified. No registration found, or need to renew.
ERROR.SEND_MEMBERSHIP_IN_FAILED: Error while sending registration as member.
ERROR.GET_CURRENCIES_FAILED: Unable to load currencies. Please retry later.
ERROR.GET_CURRENCY_FAILED: Could not load currency. Please retry later.
ERROR.ALL_SOURCES_USED: Please wait the next block computation (All transaction sources has been used).
ERROR.NOT_ENOUGH_SOURCES:
Not enough changes to send this amount in one time.
Maximum amount: {{amount}} {{unit}}{{subUnit}}.
ERROR.ACCOUNT_CREATION_FAILED: Error while creating your member account.
ERROR.RESTORE_WALLET_DATA_ERROR: Error while reloading settings from local storage
ERROR.LOAD_PEER_DATA_FAILED: Duniter peer not accessible. Please retry later.
ERROR.INVALID_USER_ID: Field 'pseudonym' must not contains spaces or special characters.
ERROR.INVALID_PUBKEY: Public key has a bad format.
ERROR.IDENTITY_REVOKED: This identity has been revoked {{revocationTime|formatFromNow}} ({{revocationTime|formatDate}}). It can no longer become a member.
ERROR.IDENTITY_PENDING_REVOCATION: The revocation of this identity has been requested and is awaiting processing. Certification is therefore disabled.
ERROR.IDENTITY_INVALID_BLOCK_HASH: This membership application is no longer valid (because it references a block that network peers are cancelled): the person must renew its application for membership before being certified.
ERROR.IDENTITY_EXPIRED: This identity has expired: this person must re-apply before being certified.
ERROR.IDENTITY_SANDBOX_FULL:
Could not register, because peer's sandbox is full.

Please retry later or choose another Duniter peer (in Settings).
ERROR.WALLET_INVALID_BLOCK_HASH:
Your membership application is no longer valid (because it references a block that network peers are cancelled).
You must renew your application for membership to fix this issue.
ERROR.WALLET_IDENTITY_EXPIRED:
The publication of your identity has expired.
You must re-issue your identity to resolve this issue.
ERROR.WALLET_REVOKED: Your identity has been revoked: neither your pseudonym nor your public key will be used in the future for a member account.
ERROR.WALLET_HAS_NO_SELF: Your identity must first have been published, and not expired.
ERROR.IDENTITY_ALREADY_CERTIFY:
You have already certified that identity.

Your certificate is still valid (expires {{expiresIn|formatDuration}}).
ERROR.IDENTITY_ALREADY_CERTIFY_PENDING:
You have already certified that identity.

Your certification is still pending (Deadline for treatment {{expiresIn|formatDuration}}).
ERROR.ONLY_MEMBER_CAN_EXECUTE_THIS_ACTION: You must be a member in order to perform this action.
ERROR.ONLY_SELF_CAN_EXECUTE_THIS_ACTION: You must have published your identity in order to perform this action.
ERROR.REVOCATION_FAILED: Error while trying to revoke the identity.
ERROR.ONLY_TEXT_FILE: You have to select a text file

INFO.IDENTITY_WILL_MISSING_CERTIFICATIONS: This identity will soon lack certification (at least {{willNeedCertificationCount}}).
INFO.REVOCATION_SENT_WAITING_PROCESS: Revocation has been sent successfully. It is awaiting processing.
INFO.FEATURES_NOT_IMPLEMENTED:
This features is not implemented yet.

Why not to contribute to get it faster? ;)

CONFIRM.CERTIFY_RULES:
Security warning:

Don't certify an account if you believe that:
  • 1.) the issuers identity might be faked.
  • 2.) the issuer already has another certified account.
  • 3.) the issuer purposely or carelessly violates rule 1 or 2 (he certifies faked or double accounts).

Are you sure you want to certify this identity?
CONFIRM.TRANSFER:
Transfer summary:

  • - From: {{from}}
  • - To: {{to}}
  • - Amount: {{amount}} {{unit}}
  • - Comment: {{comment}}

Are-you sure you want to do this transfer?
CONFIRM.MEMBERSHIP_OUT:
This operation is irreversible.

Are you sure you want to terminate your membership?
CONFIRM.MEMBERSHIP_OUT_2:
This operation is irreversible!

Are you sure you want to terminate your membership?
CONFIRM.LOGIN_UNUSED_WALLET:
You are logged into an account that seems inactive.

If this account does not match yours, it's probably a typing error when sign in.

Would you still continue with this account?
CONFIRM.FIX_IDENTITY:
The pseudonym {{uid}} will be published again, replacing the old publication that has expired.

Are you sure you want to continue?
CONFIRM.FIX_MEMBERSHIP:
Your application for membership will be sent.

Are you sure?
CONFIRM.RENEW_MEMBERSHIP:
Your membership will be renewed.

Are you sure?
CONFIRM.REVOKE_IDENTITY:
You will definitely revoke this identity.

The public key and the associated nickname will never be used again (for a member account).

Are you sure you want to revoke this identity?
CONFIRM.REVOKE_IDENTITY_2:
This operation is irreversible!

Are you sure you want to revoke this identity?
CONFIRM.NOT_NEED_RENEW_MEMBERSHIP:
Your membership does not need to be renewed (it will only expire in {{membershipExpiresIn|formatDuration}}).

Are you sure you want to renew your membership?
CONFIRM.SAVE_BEFORE_LEAVE: Do you want to save your changes before leaving the page?
CONFIRM.LOGOUT: Are you sure you want to logout?

JOIN.SALT:
The secret identifier is very important. It is used to hash you password, which in turn is used to calculate your public account key (its number) and the private key to access it.
Please remeber this identifier well, because there is no way to recover it when lost.
Furthermore, it cannot be changed without having to create a new account.

A good secret identifier must be sufficiently long (8 characters at the very least) and as original as possible.
JOIN.PASSWORD:
The password is very important. Together with the secret identifier, it is use to calculate your account number (pblic key) and the private key to access it.
Please remember it well, because there is no way to recover it when lost.
Furthermore, it cannot be changed without having to create a new account.

A good password is made (ideally) of at least 8 characters, with at least one capital and one number.
JOIN.PSEUDO:
A pseudonym is used only when joining as member. It is always associated with a wallet (by its public key).
It is published on the network so that other users may identify it, certify or send money to the account.
A pseudonym must be unique among all members (current and past).

GLOSSARY.PUBKEY_DEF: A public key always identifies a wallet. It may identify a member.
GLOSSARY.MEMBER_DEF: A member is a real and living human, wishing to participate freely to the monitary community. The member will receive universal dividend, according to the period and amount as defined in the currency parameters.
GLOSSARY.CURRENCY_RULES_DEF:
The currency rules are defined only once, and for all. They set the parameters under which the currency will perform: universal dividend calculation, the amount of certifications needed to become a member, the maximum amount of certifications a member can send, etc.

The parameters cannot be modified because of the use of a Blockchain which carries and executes these rules, and constantly verifies their correct application. See current parameters.
GLOSSARY.BLOCKCHAIN_DEF:
The Blockchain is a decentralised system which, in case of Duniter, serves to carry and execute the currency rules.
Read more about Duniter and the working of its blockchain.
GLOSSARY.UNIVERSAL_DIVIDEND_DEF:
The Universal Dividend (UD) is the quantity of money co-created by each member, according to the period and the calculation defined in the currency rules.
Every term, the members receive an equal amount of new money on their account.

The UD undergoes a steady growth, to remain fair under its members (current and future), calculated by an average life expectancy, as demonstrated in the Relative Theory of Money (RTM).
Read more about RTM and open money.

TIP.MENU_BTN_CURRENCY: Menu {{'MENU.CURRENCY'|translate}} allows discovery of currency parameters and its state.
TIP.CURRENCY_WOT: The member count shows the community's weight and evolution.
TIP.CURRENCY_MASS:
Shown here is the total amount currently in circulation and its average distribution per member.

This allows to estimate the worth of any amount, in respect to what others own on their account (on average).
TIP.CURRENCY_UNIT_RELATIVE:
The unit used here (“{{'COMMON.UD'|translate}}{{currency|abbreviate}}”) signifies that the amounts in {{currency|capitalize}} have been devided by the Universal Dividend (UD).

This relative unit is relevant because it is stable in contrast to the permanently growing monitary mass.
TIP.CURRENCY_CHANGE_UNIT: This button allows to switch the unit to show amounts in {{currency|capitalize}}, undevided by the Universal Dividend (instead of in “{{'COMMON.UD'|translate}}{{currency|abbreviate}}”).
TIP.CURRENCY_CHANGE_UNIT_TO_RELATIVE: This button allows to switch the unit to show amounts in “{{'COMMON.UD'|translate}}{{currency|abbreviate}}”, which is relative to the Universal Dividend (the amount co-produced by each member).
TIP.CURRENCY_RULES:
The rules of the currency determine its exact and predictible performance.

As a true DNA of the currency these rules make the monetary code transparent and understandable.
TIP.NETWORK_BLOCKCHAIN: All monetary transactions are recoded in a public and tamper proof ledger, generally referred to as the blockchain.
TIP.NETWORK_PEERS:
The peers shown here correspond to computers that update and check the blockchain.

The more active peers there are, the more decentralised and therefore trustworhty the currency becomes.
TIP.NETWORK_PEERS_BLOCK_NUMBER:
This number (in green) indicates the peer's latest validated block (last page written in the ledger).

Green indicates that the block was equally validated by the majority of other peers.
TIP.NETWORK_PEERS_PARTICIPATE: Each member, equiped with a computer with Internet, can participate, adding a peer simply by installing the Duniter software (free/libre). Read the installation manual >>.
TIP.MENU_BTN_ACCOUNT: {{'ACCOUNT.TITLE'|translate}} allows access to your account balance and transaction history.
TIP.MENU_BTN_ACCOUNT_MEMBER: Here you can consult your account status, transaction history and your certifications.
TIP.WALLET_CERTIFICATIONS: Click here to reveiw the details of your certifications (given and received).
TIP.WALLET_RECEIVED_CERTIFICATIONS: Click here to review the details of your received certifications.
TIP.WALLET_GIVEN_CERTIFICATIONS: Click here to review the details of your given certifications.
TIP.WALLET_BALANCE_RELATIVE:
{{'HELP.TIP.WALLET_BALANCE'|translate}}

The used unit (“{{'COMMON.UD'|translate}}{{currency|abbreviate}}”) signifies that the amount in {{currency|capitalize}} has been divided by the Universal Dividend (UD) co-created by each member.
At this moment, 1 UD equals {{currentUD}} {{currency|capitalize}}.
TIP.WALLET_BALANCE_CHANGE_UNIT:
You can change the unit in which amounts are shown in  {{'MENU.SETTINGS'|translate}}.

For example, to display amounts directly in {{currency|capitalize}} instead of relative amounts.
TIP.WALLET_PUBKEY: This is your account public key. You can communicate it to a third party so that it more easily identifies your account.
TIP.WALLET_SEND: Issue a payment in just a few clicks.
TIP.WALLET_SEND_NO_MONEY:
Issue a payment in just a few clicks.
(Your balance does not allow this yet)
TIP.WALLET_OPTIONS:
Please note that this button allows access to other, less used actions.

Don't forget to take a quick look, when you have a moment!
TIP.WALLET_RECEIVED_CERTS: This shows the list of persons that certified you.
TIP.WALLET_CERTIFY:
The button {{'WOT.BTN_SELECT_AND_CERTIFY'|translate}} allows selecting an identity and certifying it.

Only users that are already member may certify others.
TIP.WALLET_CERT_STOCK:
Your supply of certifications (to send) is limited to {{sigStock}} certifications.

This supply will replete itself over time, as and when earlier certifications expire.
TIP.MENU_BTN_TX_MEMBER: {{'MENU.TRANSACTIONS'|translate}} allow access to transactions history, and send new payments.
TIP.MENU_BTN_TX: View the history of your transactions here and send new payments.
TIP.MENU_BTN_WOT: The menu {{'MENU.WOT'|translate}} allows searching users of the currency (member or not).
TIP.WOT_SEARCH_TEXT_XS:
To search in the registry, type the first letters of a users pseudonym or public key.

The search will start automatically.
TIP.WOT_SEARCH_TEXT:
To search in the registry, type the first letters of a users pseudonym or public key.

Then hit Enter to start the search.
TIP.WOT_SEARCH_RESULT: Simply click a user row to view the details sheet.
TIP.WOT_VIEW_CERTIFICATIONS:
The row {{'ACCOUNT.CERTIFICATION_COUNT'|translate}} shows how many members members validated this identity.

These certifications testify that the account belongs to a living human and this person has no other member account.
TIP.WOT_VIEW_CERTIFICATIONS_COUNT: There are at least {{sigQty}} certifications needed to become a member and receive the Universal Dividend.
TIP.WOT_VIEW_CERTIFICATIONS_CLICK: Click here to open a list of all certifications given to and by this identity.
TIP.WOT_VIEW_CERTIFY: The button {{'WOT.BTN_CERTIFY'|translate}} allows to add your certification to this identity.
TIP.CERTIFY_RULES:
Attention: Only certify real and living persons that do not own any other certified account.

The trust carried by the currency depends on each member's vigilance!
TIP.MENU_BTN_SETTINGS:
The {{'MENU.SETTINGS'|translate}} allow you to configure the Cesium application.

For example, you can change the unit in which the currency will be shown.
TIP.HEADER_BAR_BTN_PROFILE: Click here to access your user profile
TIP.SETTINGS_CHANGE_UNIT:
You can change the display unit of amounts by clicking here.

- Deactivate the option to show amounts in {{currency|capitalize}}.
- Activate the option for relative amounts in {{'COMMON.UD'|translate}}{{currency|abbreviate}} (divided by the current Universal Dividend).
TIP.END_LOGIN:
This guided visit has ended.

Welcome to the free economy!
TIP.END_NOT_LOGIN:
This guided visit has ended.

If you wish to join the currency {{currency|capitalize}}, simply click {{'LOGIN.CREATE_ACCOUNT'|translate}} below.
